original_title: 2499 อันธพาลครองเมือง
overview: Dang Bireley, a young man who became famous in Phra Nakorn as a Gangster. Everything swung his way until one of Thailand's many coups d'etat imposed martial law and drove the city's gangsters up-country. Dang and his loyal cohort Piak had little trouble facing down the local hicks, but bristled when forced to operate a long side their arch-enemy Pu, known as Bottle-Bomb.
tagline: The bad boys that become a legend.
title: Dang Bireley's and Young Gangsters
